author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Haynes International Posts Q2 Loss Per Share $1.82 Including Items
text:
Feb 1 (Reuters) - Haynes International Inc:
* HAYNES INTERNATIONAL, INC. REPORTS FIRST QUARTER FISCAL 2018 FINANCIAL RESULTS
* Q1 REVENUE FELL 3.9 PERCENT TO $89.7 MILLION * Q1 NON-GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.24 EXCLUDING ITEMS * Q2 LOSS PER SHARE $1.82 INCLUDING ITEMS * BACKLOG OF $205.7 MILLION AT DECEMBER 31, 2017 * TOTAL PLANNED CAPITAL EXPENDITURES FOR FISCAL 2018 ARE EXPECTED TO BE $16.0 MILLION, SIMILAR TO FISCAL 2017
* EXPECTS HIGHER REVENUE IN Q2 AS WELL AS EARNINGS CLOSER TO BREAK-EVEN THAN THOSE OF Q1 OF FISCAL 2018
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $-0.31, REVENUE VIEW $93.6 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
